Uses of Class
net.sf.expectit.ExpectBuilder

  • Packages that use ExpectBuilder 
    Package Description
    net.sf.expectit
    Classes for implementing expect-like functionality.

    • Uses of ExpectBuilder in net.sf.expectit

      Methods in net.sf.expectit that return ExpectBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withBufferSize(int bufferSize)
      Sets the size of the input buffer in bytes.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withCharset(Charset charset)
      Sets the character encoding used to covert bytes when working with byte streams.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withEchoInput(Appendable firstInput, Appendable... otherInputs)
      Enables printing of all the received data.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withEchoOutput(Appendable echoOutput)
      Enables printing of all the sent data.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withEchoOutput(EchoOutput echoOutput)
      Deprecated. 
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withErrorOnTimeout(boolean errorOnTimeout)
      Enables throwing an AssertionError if any expect operation times out.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withInfiniteTimeout()
      Sets the default timeout to infinity.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withInputFilters(Filter filter, Filter... moreFilters)
      Sets a filter for the input.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withInputs(InputStream... inputs)
      Sets the input streams for expect operations.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withLineSeparator(String lineSeparator)
      Sets the line separator used by the Expect.sendLine() method.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withOutput(OutputStream output)
      Sets the output stream where Expect sends command to.
      ExpectBuilder ExpectBuilder.withTimeout(long duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Sets the default timeout in the given unit for expect operations.
